means: 认为…是（ attribute的第三人称单数 ）
认为某事[物]属于某人[物]

sentence.Network_en: Both groups share two attributes normally associated with vertebrates.
sentence.Network_cn: 两组都具有通常脊椎动物才具备的两个特征。

sentence.Network_en: We have already seen the sum total of his attributes.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们已经见识了他所有的那点儿品质。

sentence.Network_en: His cunning and guile were not attributes I would ever underestimate.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从未对他的狡猾和奸诈掉以轻心。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 该教程不是用属性化(attributes)。 随着下面的教程，你将学习怎样添加控件到ATL工程，该控件在多边形中画园和进行填充。
when you copy an NTFS file to a FAT volume , such as a floppy disk , data streams and other attributes not supported by FAT are lost .当你拷贝一个NTFS文件到一个FAT卷，诸如一张软盘，数据流和其它不被FAT支持的属性将丢失。
Patience is one of the most important attributes in a teacher ., 当教师最重要的一个品性就是要有耐心.

list.abs: 属性（attribute）节点的 nodeName 是属性名称文本（text）节点的 nodeName 永远是 #text 文档（document）节点的 nodeName 永 …
特性（attribute）是被指定给某一声明的一则附加的声明性信息。 在C#中，有一个小的预定义特性集合。
归因(attribution)是指根据有关的外部信息、线索判断人的内在状态，或依据外在行为表现推测行为原因的过程，也称归因过程。海德 …

entry.def: If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation.

example.ex: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
example.tran: 女性倾向于将她们的成功归因于外部因素，比如运气。

entry.tran: 将（品质或特征）加于…;认为…为…所有
entry.def: If you attribute a particular quality or feature to someone or something, you think that they have got it.

example.ex: People were beginning to attribute superhuman qualities to him.
example.tran: 人们开始觉得他超人一等。

entry.tran: 认为(文章、艺术品或评论）出自…
entry.def: If a piece of writing, a work of art, or a remark is attributed to someone, people say that they wrote it, created it, or said it.

example.ex: This, and the remaining frescoes, are not attributed to Giotto.
example.tran: 这个，还有那些残存的湿壁画，都不是乔托的作品。

example.ex: ...a Madonna and Child attributed to Pietro Lorenzetti.
example.tran: 被认为出自彼得罗·洛伦泽蒂之手的作品《圣母子》

entry.def: An attribute is a quality or feature that someone or something has.

example.ex: Cruelty is a normal attribute of human behaviour...
He has every attribute you could want and could play for any team.
example.tran: 他具备你想要的所有品质，放在哪个队都行。

auth_sentence.content: For alt and title attributes see Textual Equivalents Standard.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: For alt and title attributes see Textual Equivalents Standard.

auth_sentence.content: The attributes range from a genius to a crackpot.
auth_sentence.res_content: The attributes range from a genius to a crackpot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The attributes range from a genius to a crackpot.

auth_sentence.content: Might they be unfavorable attributes in a changing world?
auth_sentence.res_content: Might they be unfavorable attributes in a changing world?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Might they be unfavorable attributes in a changing world?

Sentence.sentence: "If you ask Japanese students to list the positive attributes they expect in a romantic partner, they rate highly things like loyalty, commitment and devotion," says O'Sullivan.

sentences.en: Modest is one of his best attributes.
sentences.cn: 谦虚是他的好品性之一。
